name: Home Page
heroTitle: We are a congregation of sinners saved by God's sovereign grace who are committed to the Bible, discipleship and the gospel.
heroText: We are committed to the principles of Reformed theology which we believe to be the best expression of the Bible, discipleship and the gospel.

name: About Us
heroText: We are a credo-baptist congregation committed to the principles of Reformed covenantal theology. Our foundation is the Bible, our desire is to see discipleship happen for every person and we seek to elevate the gospel in all areas as our only hope of salvation.

name: Ministries
heroText: At Covenant Reformed Church we offer Sunday School, Men's Theology, Ladies Bible Study, and Youth programs for growing in faith together.

name: Events
heroText: Stay connected with what's happening at Covenant Reformed Church.

name: Online Services
heroText: Watch and listen to sermons and Bible teaching from Covenant Reformed Church on YouTube and SoundCloud.

name: Contact
heroText: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out anytime!
